detail_desc: Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a tie-front hem.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, a regular waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
One-shoulder body in sturdy jersey with one narrow shoulder strap with a metal detail at one end, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined at the top.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Silk tie. Width 7 cm.

Non-wired triangle bra in mesh with decorative sparkly stones and cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and short legs. Lined.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede with a round metal buckle. Width 6 cm.

Pyjamas with a fitted top in ribbed jersey and shorts in woven fabric. Top with a gathered V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and frilled hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short necklace made from twisted strands of pearly plastic beads. Adjustable length 37-45 cm.

Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, padded top edge and zip in one side. Elasticated lacing at the front, a loop at the back and decorative welt seams around the soles. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide ties at the sides.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. One dress is patterned.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slip-on trainers in mesh with elastic gores in the sides. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print. Double-layered drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved body in textured jersey with a deep V-neck, lined cups and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded laptop case in soft leather with a zip at the top that continues down one side. Cotton canvas lining. Size 24.5x34 cm. Fits laptops up to 13".
Wide top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.

Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in soft superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 2-12Y), and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets,real back pockets and narrow hems.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
A pair of earrings in textured metal. Length 4.5 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Slip-on canvas trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Short, high-waisted skirt in stretch velour. Visible zip at the front with a round tab decorated with sparkly stones.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

prod_name: DeLuca pull on TVP RW TVP
detail_desc: Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Detachable, braided belt with metal rings.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide A-line skirt. Lined over the bust.
Sleeveless bodysuits in ribbed organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Block-coloured top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Calf-length, pleated, bell-shaped skirt in satin. High waist with elastication at the back and a concealed zip in one side.

Ankle-length jeggings in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy weave made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, pleat down the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with appliqués and plastic beads at the top. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Lined.
Cropped top in smocked jersey made partly from recycled polyester with a square neckline. Long mesh sleeves with flock-print spots and smocked seams in the middle and at the cuffs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Stretch twill treggings in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and decorations on the legs.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with a lace trim at the top, wide sides, a lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow metal-chain shoulder strap, zip at the top and inner compartment. Lined. Size 2.5x17x23 cm.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh sections and a racer back.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a wraparound funnel collar with a drawstring and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, striped jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with long sleeves, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.

Long, fitted dress in crinkled jersey with glittery threads. Narrow cut at the top, a halter neck with concealed press-studs at the back, and a concealed zip at the back. Close-fitting skirt that flares at the hem and has a high slit at the front. Jersey lining.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck with a wide flounced trim that continues down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidery detail on the chest, and a rounded hem.
Longer, off-the-shoulder top in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Double layer at the top, long sleeves and gathered side seams for best fit.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a fake fly with decorative buttons.
Calf-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Round neckline with decorative gathers, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, elbow-length raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and small embroidery detail on the chest. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Flat sandals with wide crossover foot straps and an elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
